actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to make certain gasoline sales promotion games unfair methods of competition unless the customer is offered as an alternative in cash the retail cost per gallon of the game.

summary.text: Specifies, under the provisions of the Federal Trade Commission Act, that gasoline sales promotion games shall be unfair methods of competition unless the customer is offered as an alternative in cash the retail cost per gallon of the game. Authorizes the Federal Trade Commission to require any information from distributors retail sellers and game promoters which is necessary to enforce this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to make certain gasoline sales promotion games unfair methods of competition unless the customer is offered as an alternative in cash the retail cost per gallon of the game.
